title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on Short Trips
content:
Play as Franklin and Lamar in Short Trips to build LD Organics into a legitimate herbal empire and earn 2X GTA$ and RP for your efforts. GTA+ Members pocket even more with these Short Trips bonuses doubled to 4X GTA$ and RP.

Launch this trio of missions through your iFruit via Quick Join > Contact Missions > Short Trip or from the Rockstar Created missions list within the Pause Menu.
